name: Ninja Legend:Fire Will
description:
The legendary 3D action RPG mobile game has logged in to the Apple store!
Log in now to send gifts every day on the 15th!
There are even more open service welfare feedback activities!
It's time to step into a new era of ninjas!

【Happy Fighting】
AFK mode: Set up the on-hook team to pass the level to obtain the on-hook treasure chest, which contains a large number of treasures and random hero fragments waiting for you to collect; there are mysterious rewards waiting for you in the major levels

Tower of Ninja: develop heroes, increase combat power, and keep climbing towers to obtain rare items quickly and powerfully;

Chase and Flee Rennin: Team up to attack, Rennin steals a lot of treasures, chase Rennin to get a lot of rewards

【Fun sports】
Nindo Showdown: Train multiple factions of heroes to form a strong defensive formation waiting for opponents to challenge or take the initiative to conquer all opponents;

Mine War: Cultivate the lineup to fight against the rest of the players to win mine points, and get accumulated mine rewards;

【Super cute casual】
Dispatch: Idle heroes will have a pleasant surprise when they are dispatched;

Guild: Only a powerful hero group can war against the guild boss, win top loot, upgrade guild technology, and build guild facilities;

【Exquisite System】
Melting Pot: Items, equipment, hero synthesis, decomposition, star rise to obtain different props to exchange to build your own lineup genre;

Shop: The Dark Rally has an unexpected rare item trade. You can exchange for heroes and equipment at the exchange to obtain props and items from the furnace;

【Hero System】
Quality: The difference between white card, green card, purple card, and orange card heroes is not only the difference in attack, defense, and hit. The higher the quality, the more powerful the exclusive skills;

Strengthening: card upgrades, star breakthroughs, skill upgrades, gem-inlaid heroes, infinite power beyond;

Equipment: The exclusive attributes of blue, purple, orange, and red quality equipment become the basis for the growth of heroes' combat effectiveness.
